name: Strathcona Gift Certificate!
description:
Available in various amounts:

One Pair
Three Pack
$50
$100

Good for thoughtful (and time sensitive) gifts.

How it works:
When you purchase your Gift Certificate you will receive a confirmation email shortly there after which will include a 5 digit code. When your recipient is ready to redeem their GC they purchase their items online as per normal and then email us their 5 digit code. We will then refund their payment and re-invoice in relation to the value of the Gift Certificate.

Legal: 
All Gift Certificates are in US dollars and are only redeemable in the Strathcona Stockings Big Cartel and Etsy stores. All Gift Certificates are valid for one year after the purchase date.

No cash back offered.

name: Watercolour Polka-dot Stockings
description:
This print is for Yayoi.

Painted polkadots.

Socks are individually printed. The exact elements featured will change slightly with every sock -- making each pair unique!

The stockings are

● Soft and silky 
● Opaque 
● Knee-hi trouser stockings 
● One size fits all

To give them the longest life, treat them with care! 
The colours may fade with age and wear.

Please feel free to contact us with questions. 
(Yes, we ship internationally!)

-----------------------------------------

www.strathconastockings.com

name: Black Bird Printed Tights
description:
This unique pattern was created by collaging vintage bird drawings.

Because of many requests -- we have made a limited number of tights for fall winter... Specialty printed in Vancouver, Canada. 

The tights are

● Soft and silky 
● Opaque 
● Full length tights
● These tights are technically a M/L but we think they fit more like a S/M

To give them the longest life, treat them with care and hand wash in cool water. The colours may fade with age and wear.

Please feel free to contact us with questions. 
(Yes, we ship internationally!)
